div.p: … until the 5th of … of the current 4th year of Imperator Caesar Titus Aelius Hadrianus Antoninus Augustus Pius. Year 4 of Imperator Caesar Titus Aelius Hadrianus Antoninus Augustus Pius. Year 4 of Imperator Caesar Titus Aelius Hadrianus Antoninus Augustus Pius, Epeiph. I, Kastor, registered (it) as aforesaid. Translation: N. Gonis, P.Harr. 3 312
